title: Elemental Weapon
content:
Elemental Weapon Level 3 Transmutation Spell Imbue a weapon with elemental power. It receives a +1 bonus to Attack Rolls, and deals an additional 1d4 damage of your choice. Melee Concentration Action Level 3 Spell Slot

Elemental Weapon

Level 3 Transmutation Spell

Imbue a weapon with elemental power. It receives a +1 bonus to Attack Rolls, and deals an additional 1d4 damage of your choice.
